urls.title: URLs to Scrape
urls.description: List of website URLs to scrape. Enter one URL per line.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape concurrently. Higher = faster but more resource intensive.

depth.title: Crawl Depth
depth.description: How deep to crawl internal links. 0 = homepage only, 1 = homepage + direct links, 2 = homepage + 2 levels of links.

autoDiscoverPages.title: Auto-Discover Contact Pages
autoDiscoverPages.description: Automatically find and scrape contact, about, support, team, and other relevant pages.

targetPages.title: Target Pages to Find
targetPages.description: Specific page types to automatically discover and scrape.

retryAttempts.title: Retry Attempts
retryAttempts.description: Number of times to retry failed requests.

timeout.title: Page Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for a page to load (in seconds).

useProxy.title: Use Proxy
useProxy.description: Use Apify proxy servers to avoid blocks and rate limiting.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Apify Proxy configuration. Leave empty to use default.
proxyConfiguration.sectionDescription: Configure proxy settings for better reliability

extractPhones.title: Extract Phone Numbers
extractPhones.description: Extract phone numbers (US and international formats).

extractSocials.title: Extract Social Media Links
extractSocials.description: Extract social media profile links (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.).

extractMetadata.title: Extract Metadata
extractMetadata.description: Extract page title, description, and other metadata.

verificationEnabled.title: Enable Verification
verificationEnabled.description: Track and verify that all pages and data sources were checked. Adds confidence scores to results.

minConfidenceScore.title: Minimum Confidence Score
minConfidenceScore.description: Only include results with confidence score above this threshold (0.0 to 1.0).
